name: Blood from Vein
description:
BLOOD FROM VEIN

An action game  with simple controls and  designed with Pixel art. Run, jump, collect blood, survive obstacles and fight for your own life.

Damon is a young handsome man who got converted into a vampire.  Few months ago, he was just a regular boy making his own life till another vampire attacked him . Ever since, Damon needs to survive and try to avoid all the obstacles that are trying to end with his life. We need your help to help him live as long as possible!

The Adventurer is a bloody , mini, free, handcrafted, 2D game designed to be fun, unique, small & neat, which can evoke fond memories and nostalgic experience of veteran gamers on computers!

It is an indie game developed by two developers and made with Construct 2.

Features:
  • Short story driven
  • Smooth and fluid gameplay
  • Epic action
  • Simple controls
  • Boss Battle
  • Exciting and short gameplay 

DOWNLOAD NOW AND ENJOY! FREE OF CHARGES
